data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 3,000,000 citizens of Kasaï-Central, Democratic Republic of the Congo, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kasaï-Central, Democratic Republic of the Congo

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Kasaï-Central, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Kasaï-Central.
Father, help the 576,669 believers in Kasaï-Central to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Kasaï-Central to agree with you and with one another.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Kasaï-Central.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Kasaï-Central that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.focus_label: Kasaï-Central, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary:
the state of Kasaï-Central, Democratic Republic of the Congo has a population of 3,000,000.

We estimate Kasaï-Central has 576,669 people who might know Jesus, 2,172,744 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 250,587 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.
